title: Ticket #7536: Turn of CONDOR_SSH_TO_JOB_FAKE_PASSWD_ENTRY by default
description: Earlier in 8.9, we added the knob CONDOR_SSH_TO_JOB_FAKE_PASSWD_ENTRY to work around problems using condor_ssh_to_job on sites whose /etc/passwd file didn't have a shell defined for the slot user. After testing this in CHTC we will know make true the default value.
remarks:
